--- set_operators.sql
GRAPH MyGraph
RETURN 1 AS x
UNION ALL
RETURN 2 AS x
UNION ALL
RETURN 3 AS x

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 13,
          Name:    "MyGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLCompoundLinearQueryStatement{
        Op:            "UNION",
        AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
        Statements:    []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
                Return:      14,
                ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 21,
                      ValueEnd: 22,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "1",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 26,
                      NameEnd: 27,
                      Name:    "x",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
                Return:      38,
                ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 45,
                      ValueEnd: 46,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "2",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 50,
                      NameEnd: 51,
                      Name:    "x",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
                Return:      62,
                ReturnItems: []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 69,
                      ValueEnd: 70,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "3",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.Ident{
                      NamePos: 74,
                      NameEnd: 75,
                      Name:    "x",
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH MyGraph RETURN 1 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 2 AS x UNION ALL RETURN 3 AS x
